caption: Relating to the applicability of sex offender registration requirements to the offense of indecent assault.
summary: This bill amends the Code of Criminal Procedure to include indecent assault as a reportable offense requiring sex offender registration after a second violation. The bill does not specifically target Chinese immigrants or any particular ethnic group - it applies equally to all individuals convicted of the specified offenses regardless of nationality.
translation: 该法案修改《刑事诉讼法》，将猥亵侵犯列为需要性犯罪者登记的应报告罪行（在第二次违法后）。该法案并不特别针对中国移民或任何特定族裔群体 - 它平等适用于所有被判定犯有特定罪行的个人，不论其国籍。
committees:
1. Criminal Justice Committee
2. Judiciary Committee
3. Public Safety Committee
